column1: What’s at stake on Jan.5? An effective public health response to #COVID19 a strong economic recovery and health care for all Americans—especially those with pre-existing conditions. Let’s help @ossoff & @ReverendWarnock keep #Georgia Blue. https://t.co/53YKciv2gi

The challenges we face are grave but we can overcome them.  Only if we come together as one Nation to defeat #COVID19 rebuild our economy and fight for equality #ForThePeople. Despite the passage of #TheHeroesAct by the House of Representatives in May 2020 and an updated version in October the Senate failed to pass a comprehensive COVID-19 relief bill. #Vote for people who will.

The #COVID19 pandemic has wreaked havoc on communities across the country and devastated the nation’s economy. The United States leads the world with confirmed cases and deaths. Millions are out of work and struggling to make ends meet.
